Articles.Content:
DRES v0.0.1

adds a new planet called Dres to fill the space between Duna and Jool. It can be considered an analog for Ceres. It is a rocky gray planet with a huge canyon just south of the equator. Includes 8 biomes and an asteroid belt.

 

Dres is a very small planet. It was the first planet considered to be a dwarf. It’s orbit is highly irregular and together with it’s size it took a long time to discover since half the time it was not where scientists expected to find a planet. Due to its nature of frequenting the bad parts of space, this dwarf planet was officially labeled as “Not to be trusted” by the scientific community.''

— Kerbal Astronomical Society

 

Requires {snip}

 

Download from {snip} or with CKAN

↓SCREENSHOTS↓

Spoiler

 

 

Edited December 20, 2023 by Gargamel
Obnoxious loud links removed.

I recommend this mod to anyone who wants to spice up their KSP experience without having any noticable performance drops
10/10

Since there is no valid license provided, we’ve had to snip the links, but we’ve left the screenshots.    As one cannot replace something that reportedly never existed, this mod is a paradox and shall be locked.
